message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a fairer split. This is better for you than waiting.
I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your counteroffer
Time is running out, Alice. This is a reasonable deal.
I'll take a smaller share, but still more than you offered
Let's be real, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
